about_the_game:
Welcome to 101 Cute Dogs: Find & Paint, the ultimate game for dog lovers and fans of hidden object adventures! Explore a world filled with charming dogs, each waiting to be discovered. Search through vibrant scenes to find hidden pups, then switch to painting mode to bring them to life with your artistic flair.

Key Features:

  • Hidden Object Fun: Search and find 101 dogs hidden in a beautifull hand-drawn illustration.
  • Creative Painting: Bring the illustration to life with a wide range of colors and painting tools.
  • Relaxing Gameplay: Enjoy a calm and stress-free gaming experience, perfect for winding down.
  • Suitable for All Ages: A perfect game for both kids and adults, combining fun with creativity.

Hidden Object Mode Features

  • Find & Discover: Search and find 101 dogs hidden in a beautifull hand-drawn illustration.
  • Hints & Clues System: If you’re stuck, use hints to help you locate hard-to-find dogs. The game offers a generous hint system that ensures you never get frustrated.
  • Zoom Feature: Easily zoom in on sections of the scene to find smaller or hidden dogs, making sure no pup goes undiscovered.

Painting Mode Features

  • User-Friendly Interface: The painting tools are easy to use, making it accessible for all skill levels and ages.
  • Save & Share Artwork: After finishing a painting, save your masterpiece to your gallery or share it with friends on Steam or Social media.
  • Multiple Tools and Colors: From multiple brushes, to painting bucket you have multiple tools to bring you vision to life.

Other Features

  • High Quality Resolution Hand-Drawn Artwork
  • Awesome Soundtrack
  • Achievements
  • Brightness Settings
  • Progress Saves
  • Zoom
  • No Text

name: 101 Cute Dogs: Find & Paint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Find adorable dogs hidden in a beautifull hand drawn illustrationand unleash your creativity by painting them! Relax and enjoy this delightful blend of hidden object and painting gameplay.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
